trans-unit.source: A base class for events associated with a <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> .
trans-unit.target: Una classe di base per eventi associati a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> is also used in the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> viene anche utilizzato nel gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> di un'istanza <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> of the workflow that was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente controlla l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passato nel gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> di un'istanza <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> e visualizza l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> del flusso di lavoro scaricato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensions of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di estensioni del tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore univoco dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> of the workflow that was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente controlla l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> passato nel gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> di un'istanza <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> e visualizza l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A> del flusso di lavoro scaricato.
